alert.note: Alert for Carroll (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 14 at 4:09PM EDT until October 14 at 9:32PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Saco River At Conway affecting Carroll County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Saco River at Conway. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs as floodwaters surround properties across Transvale Acres. Flood waters 1 to 2 feet deep in sections of east bank camping areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM EDT Friday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 945 PM EDT.
